statuses.name: Active
statuses.desc: These are the projects that I update regularly.

statuses.name: Maintained
statuses.desc: These projects are not as active as the above ones, but are still being maintained.

statuses.name: Unfinished
statuses.desc: These are projecst that are in an unfinished state. They are still in development, but aren't fully functional yet.

statuses.name: Unmaintained
statuses.desc: These are projects that may still work, but aren't being maintained anymore. They may eventually be resurrected, but at the moment, they are on hold.

statuses.name: Abandoned
statuses.desc: Some may work, others may not, whatever the case, these projects are kept for historical purposes only. They are officially discontinued, never to be resurrected.

perl6-psgi.name: PSGI
perl6-psgi.desc: Parse an PSGI response and output an HTTP Response header

template6.name: Template6
template6.desc: A TT-like template engine for Perl 6

SCGI.name: SCGI
SCGI.desc: A library for building SCGI applications.

perl6-fastcgi.name: FastCGI
perl6-fastcgi.desc: A library for building FastCGI applications.

perl6-http-easy.name: HTTP::Easy
perl6-http-easy.desc: Build HTTP servers (with PSGI support) easily.

moon.name: Rakudo Moon
moon.desc: Build bleeding edge builds of Rakudo Perl 6 and Panda.

datetime-format-perl6.name: DateTime::Format::Perl6
datetime-format-perl6.desc: Perl 6 style date format support for DateTime

perl5-disc-info.name: Disc::Info
perl5-disc-info.desc: Query ISO discs and images for metadata.

perl6-datetime-math.name: DateTime::Math
perl6-datetime-math.desc: Perform common math and comparison operations with DateTime

perl6-datetime-format.name: DateTime::Format
perl6-datetime-format.desc: strftime, strptime, and other formatting utils for DateTime

blacknoise.name: Blacknoise
blacknoise.desc: Build static web sites in Perl 5 (without TAL)

greynoise.name: GreyNoise
greynoise.desc: Build static websites using Perl 5 (with TAL)

pickle.name: Pickle
pickle.desc: Cucumber-like BDD story engine for Perl 6.

esquel.name: Esquel
esquel.desc: Build SQL queries using method calls, never finished.

ww6.name: ww6
ww6.desc: A (complete) web framework. Missing deps, broken everywhere.

HashConfig.name: HashConfig
HashConfig.desc: Configuration data in Hash objects, but with more magic.

perl6-method-modifiers.name: Method::Modifiers
perl6-method-modifiers.desc: Wrapper to wrap(). Just for kicks.
